hero.headline: Experience Dentistry That Feels Like Home
hero.subheadline: From routine checkups to complex cosmetic makeovers, we provide a full range of dental treatments tailored to your unique needs.

items.title: General Dentistry
items.description: Routine cleanings, exams, and preventative care.

team.title: Dr. Sarah Mitchell, DDS
team.bio: With over 15 years of clinical experience, Dr. Mitchell combines artistic vision with medical precision. She is passionate about creating a stress-free environment where patients feel heard and cared for.

cta_banner.headline: Ready for your best smile?
cta_banner.subheadline: Schedule your visit today and experience the difference of patient-centered care. No hidden fees, just great dentistry.
